name: Loops Feedback
description:

Gather comments from customers, team members, and stakeholders in one place and transform it into actionable tasks that you work through in Figma.


Build an interactive survey on top of your design and ask multiple choice, open and closed questions.


What often takes days or weeks, Loops helps you do in minutes.


HOW LOOPS WORKS


Interactive Survey Mode

  1. Build an interactive survey on top of your design and asking multiple choice questions or open text fields about your design.
  2. Choose your audience. Use your own teammates or users. Need external feedback from a certain demographic? No problem- recruit from our global panel of 110m consumers.
  3. Users give annotated feedback on your design. Get quantitative and qualitative results in realtime.


Collaborative Mode

  1. Export designs to Loops and share a secure link to your users or teammates.
  2. People can give instant feedback with no login required.
  3. People can leave comments relating to an annotation or region on top of your design.
  4. Tag, filter and bookmark the most insightful comments.


WHY LOOPS


Remove the admin of feedback. No sign ups or logins. Access 110m people from consumers to experts instantly.


Keep feedback focused. Your respondents are guided step-by-step through your design.


Connect insight to ideas. See feedback annotated on your designs.


Visit useloops.com
